body:
There seems to be a build issue, at least for me, on summitdev (Power system at ORNL).  When I build the newest version of  Ilibjpeg-turbo get this error:
```
==> Installing libjpeg-turbo
==> Searching for binary cache of libjpeg-turbo
==> Finding buildcaches in /ccs/home/jgalaro/spack-mirror/build_cache
==> No binary for libjpeg-turbo found: installing from source
==> Error: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/-'

```
When I back off to the 1.5.3 version of libjpeg-turbo, it builds successfully:

```
==> Installing libjpeg-turbo
==> Searching for binary cache of libjpeg-turbo
==> Finding buildcaches in /ccs/home/jgalaro/spack-mirror/build_cache
==> No binary for libjpeg-turbo found: installing from source
==> Fetching file:///ccs/home/jgalaro/spack-mirror/libjpeg-turbo/libjpeg-turbo-1.5.3.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Staging archive: /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/jgalaro/spack/var/spack/stage/libjpeg-turbo-1.5.3-goxklzxo5pvb7nhd36uw3ywkdslu4x5p/1.5.3.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/jgalaro/spack/var/spack/stage/libjpeg-turbo-1.5.3-goxklzxo5pvb7nhd36uw3ywkdslu4x5p
==> No patches needed for libjpeg-turbo
==> Building libjpeg-turbo [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Successfully installed libjpeg-turbo
```

Recreated by:
spack install libjpeg-turbo %gcc@4.8.5 with the default version in the package.py file.
title: Ilibjpeg-turbo newest version does not build with spack on summitdev
